description: Now alice can remember things you teach her!

intents.name: GetUserFact
intents.description: User asks for a fact about himself
utterances: can you tell me what's my {favorite color:=>Fact}
can you tell me what's my {name:=>Fact} please
tell me what's my {name:=>Fact} please
tell me what's my {size:=>Fact}
tell me what's my {name:=>Fact} please
do you know what's my {name:=>Fact}
do you remember what's my {favorite dish:=>Fact}
tell me who's my {wife:=>Fact}
do you know who's my {best friend:=>Fact}
do you remember who's my {dad:=>Fact}
do you know when's my {birthday:=>Fact}
do you know when my {birthday:=>Fact} is
do you remember when my {birthday:=>Fact} is
do you remember when's {birthday:=>Fact}
can you tell me when i {got my driver's license:=>Fact}
please tell me what my {cat name:=>Fact} is
do you know how {tall:=>Fact} i am
do remember how {tall:=>Fact} i am
do remember how much I {weigh:=>Fact}
do know how much I {weigh:=>Fact}
what's my {favorite season:=>Fact}
what's my {favorite song:=>Fact} please
do you remember {the village where i grew up:=>Fact}

intents.name: DeleteAllUserFacts
intents.description: User wants all his data erased
utterances: delete all you know about me
forget everything about me
please completly forget about me
remove anything you know about me please
delete all my data please
i want you to forget about me
forget everything about me please
delete all stored data about me
get rid of all you know about me
please get rid of all my facts
please remove all my facts from your database
i don't want you to remember anything from me
